title: Horn used by Norman Spencer
brief_description: Long, thin horn with electrically powered motor, used on the TV program “In Melbourne Tonight”, by Norman Spencer as an early form of television censorship
description: Long, thin horn with electrically powered motor, used on the TV program “In Melbourne Tonight”, by Norman Spencer as an early form of television censorship
